trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that represents a binding terminal that supports the flow of data into and out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
trans-unit.target: La classe di base astratta che rappresenta un terminale dell'associazione che supporta il flusso di dati in e da un <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection" /> that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" /> represents the flow of data into an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, or both into and out of an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <see cref="T:System.Activities.ArgumentDirection" /> che specifica se il <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" /> rappresenta il flusso di dati in <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, da <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />, o entrambe <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the direction of the flow of data through the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica la direzione del flusso di dati attraverso l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the argument using the specified activity context.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore dell'argomento utilizzando lo specifico contesto dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> of the value referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il percorso <see cref="T:System.Activities.Location" /> del valore cui fa riferimento il <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the value referenced by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione del valore cui fa riferimento il <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string value used by <see cref="P:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore stringa usato da <see cref="P:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name" />.
